body.name: Modern Desk Chair no Wheel, Ergonomic Office Chair Home Office Upholstered Chair, Swivel Arm Chairs with Metal Legs, Computer Chair for Bedroom, Reception Room, Living Room
features: 【Modern Style & Aesthetics Appearance】Jiexi desk chair no wheels adopt simple and fashionable design with modern style. Swivel accent chairs for living room, simple appearance and solid structure, office chair no wheels can largely match your furniture and living style.

【Humanized Ergonomic Design】This home office desk chair is very comfortable and relaxing to sit on. Office chair ergonomically designed perfect height and upholstered seat provide good support for your back when sitting. Upholstered armchair compared with traditional wooden chairs, never feel uncomfortable when sitting for a long time. Give your family or friends a good leisure time.

【Stable Metal Legs & Durable Soft Materials】Upholstered desk chair uses 4 carbon steel legs and high quality polyester cotton fabric to make the chair durable. Office desk chair can support up to 265 pounds. The lower carbon steel X-shaped bracket provides greater stability and load-bearing capacity.
【Suitable Dimension & Easy to Assemble】Computer desk chair quickly assemble according to the instruction manual in the box.

【Widely Application】The classic office desk chair faux linen design create an elegant appearance, which makes the mid-back chair complement a variety of home decoration styles. Swivel accent chair suitable for living room, home office, bedroom, study room, office, etc.
body.description: JIEXI Modern simple fabric armchair has plenty of appeal from chair soft cushion and padded to the base. Product Features: Armchair is made of cloth fabric soft touch but hard wearing.Accent chair features soft cotton cushion & padded seat, it is designed to provide a comfortable sitting experience.The swivel base and carbon steel legs with cross structure bring more stable, easy to assemble.Modern armchair features in stain resistant colour to make room for more living.This office chair no wheels is designed can be used as living room chair, dining room chair, bedroom chair, lounge chair, reception chair, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JIEXI Modern simple fabric armchair has plenty of appeal from chair soft cushion and padded to the base. Product Features: Armchair is made of cloth fabric soft touch but hard wearing.Accent chair features soft cotton cushion & padded seat, it is designed to provide a comfortable sitting experience.The swivel base and carbon steel legs with cross structure bring more stable, easy to assemble.Modern armchair features in stain resistant colour to make room for more living.This office chair no wheels is designed can be used as living room chair, dining room chair, bedroom chair, lounge chair, reception chair, etc. Specification: Home & office armchair Soft cloth fabric , tech sponge, painted metal legs Rotatable, No armrest design European minimalist style Fashionable beige color Flat Pack & Easy to Stall Stable 4 stand rack Soft cushion & padded seat

Ergonomic design This home office desk chairsWith an ergonomic back, our cloth fabric office chair can perfectly fit the curve of human body and relieve back fatigue. Sturdy and unique metal legs The metal legs extend outward from the pivoting base of this arm chair, modern desk chair which not only provides stability of up to 260 pounds, but also adds a unique beauty to various space occasions. Rotating base activation This mid century modern chair after the installation of the swivel chair is complete, you need to sit on the chair to provide enough gravity to make the swivel base activation. Swivel function makes you more free to do whatever you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This chair is exactly what I am looking for. The surface is kind like suede texture and it is very soft. The legs are metal made so it very steady. What I like most is the chair can be rotated. Anyway, it’s nice to have this new chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair was very reasonable so I questioned what the quality would be like. I love it. Looks good, is very sturdy, was easy to assemble and the material is perfect, it can easily be wiped down. It looks like a much more expensive chair than it was. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy... Too pricy though
reviews.reviewText: Great product but priced way too high. Also came with a stain on the bright fabric from the factory. Was able to get it out but left a Mark showing where it was cleaned. Quality and care don’t exist anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small swivel chair for a corner desk… this chair turned out perfect. It was comfortable, looked great , liked the material and color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish office chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is pretty. You can rotate the seats 360 degrees. After sitting for a few days, it is comfortable for long hour sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, very stylish yet simple. The swivel is a bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very supportive and hard as a rock!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is not at all what I thought it would be. There is no cushion whatsoever. It is like sitting on a firm flat rock! If you like firmness, then this chair is for you. I was also disappointed in the actual material covering the chair- it looks like faux leather, but is this cheap unwoven fabric?This chair is made to look nice sitting somewhere, but not for sitting in, at least in my opinion. It does swivel, it does look nice from afar- but if you want comfort, I would look elsewhere. This is just my opinion, as other reviewers seem to like it.It just looks cheap for the price I paid and I like a bit more padding in the rear area. I would be afraid to sit in the chair with a new pair of blue jeans- the dye might ruin the chair.I like the style, but nothing else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color is not accurate and too difficult to return.
reviews.reviewText: This chair is sturdy though not very comfortable but I don't mind. The biggest issue I have is with the color, it is much more yellow/cream than the picture shows. I normally wouldn't keep it because I don't like the color but it's a hassle to return and it's already assembled. It's also pretty creeky, which is annoying. But it gets the job done.
